articles.author: Paul67
articles.description: I expect you and I will discuss Celtic Park in the week after last season’s financial report is published.  We have plenty of work to do and, I expect, will have a new record back balance. Bolingoli, who completed his ill-fated £3million transfer to [...]

articles.description: CELTIC are pondering launching a record-breaking bid for Sparta Prague keeper Peter Vindahl Jensen. The champions have targeted Jensen, but the Czech outfit are [...]

articles.description: THOMAS ROGNE was seen as one for the future when he was signed by Tony Mowbray on a free from Norwegian club Stabaek in January 2010. articles.description: In 2019, the departure of then 16-year-old central defender, Liam Morrison to Bayern Munich was the cause of some regret.  What was the point of youth development if they leave at such a young age?  Liam was the first of a few who fled Glasgow to illustrious European cities like Munich and Liverpool. Five years [...]

articles.description: THERE are a few transfer problems for Brendan Rodgers to address as he attempts to strengthen his first-team squad. articles.author: CQN Magazine
articles.description: REO HATATE is a man on a mission as he prepares to launch himself into the new season. Hatate cut a frustrated figure at the beginning of Brendan Rodgers’ comeback crusade when he was on the substitutes’ bench [...]

articles.description: BY HIS OWN admission, Rocco Vata never intended to hang around Celtic. Vata took to [...]

articles.description: LASSAD NOUIOUI signed a two-year deal at Celtic on September 2 2012 as a free agent after quitting Spanish top-flight club Deportivo La Coruna. articles.description: JAMES FORREST, who celebrates his 33rd birthday today, is on the brink of becoming a Celtic History Bhoy.
